pages.text: Vin skazav, "Osʹ moyi dochky, yakshcho vy povynni
Ale, na zhalʹ!, vony povnistyu blinded yikhnim lust
Otzhe, lykho vrazyty yikh u ranku
My povernuly tse upside vnyz, ta showered yim z spustoshlyvymy skelyamy
Tse ye urok dlya tsykh khto volodiyutʹ rozvidkoyu
Tse bude zavzhdy yavlyaty soboyu systemu
Tse ye znak dlya viruyuchiv
lyudy lisiv takozh porushnyky
Otzhe, my avenged z nykh, ta obydva spilʹnoty tsilkom documented
lyudy Alʹ-Hijr disbelieved kur'yery
My daly yim nashi vidkryttya, ale vony disregarded yim
Vony zvychayno vyrizaly nadiyni domivky z hor
lykho udaryayutʹ yikh u ranku
Shcho vony prykhovaly ne dopomohly yim
My ne utvoryly nebo ta zemlyu, ta vse mizh nymy, krim dlya spetsyfichnoyi mety. Kinetsʹ svitu prybude, tak obroblyayutʹ yikh z velykodushnoyu znevahoyu
Vash Lord yavlyaye soboyu Creator, Omniscient
My daly vam sim pary, ta velyki Quran
Ne budemo revnyvyy shcho my podaruvaly inshyy (kur'yery), ta ne budemo zasmucheni (disbelievers), ta nyzhche vashe krylo dlya viruyuchiv
Ta proholoshuyutʹ: "YA yavlyayu soboyu ochevydnyy warner
My budemo maty spravu z dividers
